parameters: Guy Bake-Off
Hello, welcome to Parity! I'm Guy and I'll
be in charge of your induction.
Guy Bake-Off
The first and most important thing to know
is that the Great Office Bake Off is
starting in the next few days. Don't worry
about any of that recruitment stuff, baking
Guy Bake-Off
is what we're all about.
Guy Bake-Off
If you're going to last at Parity we'll
need to get you ready for GOBO, but don't
worry I'll help you with that.
Guy Bake-Off
Now all over the office you'll find
competitors who might be able to give you
advice or help you out.
Guy Bake-Off
If you head out the door on the right it'll
take you to Business Support where you can
buy any baking equipment you might need.
Guy Bake-Off
If you head to the bottom door it'll take
you to Leith Docks which is GOBO's gateway
to the world...
Guy Bake-Off
In the docks you'll find the Pub and the
Port Authority.
Guy Bake-Off
The Pub will allow you to rest for free and
grab a pint.
Guy Bake-Off
The Port Authority has a jail for locking
up anyone trying to cheat in GOBO but also
will sell you tickets so you can travel the
world seeking out baking secrets and win
Guy Bake-Off
GOBO!
Guy Bake-Off
What was you name again?
Guy Bake-Off
Come see me once you've had a chance to
look around.
A
Guy Bake-Off
You ready to start your baking adventure?
Yes
No
Yes
Guy Bake-Off
Fantastic! We can start on the recruitment
stuff a different week.
Guy Bake-Off
In the meantime GOBO is planning to be even
bigger and better than last year. To
achieve this we're going to knead a lot of
dough, literally for baking but also we
Guy Bake-Off
need wads of cash.
Guy Bake-Off
What we are going to do is seek sponsership
in the form of a science grant from NASA.
So I'm sending you to Texas to get the
Guy Bake-Off
money!
Guy Bake-Off
I know that their Chief Grant Officer,
Nick has a sweet tooth. So I'm going to
give you 3 Magic Brownies. One is to give
Nick to get the grant.
Guy Bake-Off
I've arranged transport for you with the
Port Master in Leith Docks. Give him a
Magical Brownie and he'll give
you a ticket to Texas.
Guy Bake-Off
The third Magical Brownie is for you, if
you end up in a sticky situation it'll
"magically" return you to the pub in Leith
Docks.
Guy Bake-Off
Now don't steal that money, I know where
you work!
No
Guy Bake-Off
Come back when you're ready.
Guy Bake-Off
Get out of here!
Guy Bake-Off
Welcome back! Do you have the dough?
Yes
No
Yes
NASA Sponsorship Money removed from inventory
Guy Bake-Off
Fantastic! Okay I...I mean GOBO needs more
of your help. So stage one of GOBO is the
head to head and I'm up in round one. Due
to my extensive GOBO and recruitment duties
Guy Bake-Off
I don't have time to travel to collect my
ingredients, that's where you come in.
Guy Bake-Off
Round one is international week and I'm
going Mexican with my bake, I need you to
go to Mexico and collect something very
special from the birthplace of chocolate.
Guy Bake-Off
I need you to break into the ancient palace
of the last Aztec Emperor Montezuma II in
the ruins of Tenochtitlan.
There you will find his special cacao beans
Guy Bake-Off
which have been preserved for 500 years.
Using this special chocolate I will be
guarenteed a win!
Guy Bake-Off
Give the Port Master this brownie for a
ticket to what was Lake Texcoco and is now
Mexico City.

Office Peeps
It’s been an extremely exciting first week
in the Bake Off building with nail-biting
results for International Cake Week.
Office Peeps
Our first entry came from GOBO’s very own
Chairman, Guy Bake-Off. Guy wowed the
judging panel (see, all of you) with his
interpretation of a Mexican chilli
Office Peeps
chocolate cake and went the extra mile with
homemade vanilla ice cream.
Comments include the following:
Office Peeps
Bonus Point for ice cream.
Perfect amount of chilli to create an
authentic effect and the ice cream
complemented the cake wonderfully.
Office Peeps
Dense sponge and rich ganache but the two
worked very well together.
This initial effort at International Cake
Office Peeps
Week meant the stakes had to be upped by
the 2015 Runner Up, Fiona Smith. Fiona
raised the bar for future bakers with an
Austrian Sacher Torte with homemade
Office Peeps
raspberry coulis and whipped cream.
Unfortunately, there can only be one winner
(each week) and despite a very mixed bag of
Office Peeps
scoring, our winner triumphed with only
0.17 difference in the average score!
The GOBO winner of International Cake Week
Office Peeps
is…. DRUM ROLL PLEASE…… FIONA!!!!
Fiona, given this week’s stellar effort and
your standing in the 2015 GOBO event, I
would like to say on behalf of all of us
Office Peeps
here at GOBO, we look forward to tasting
your effort in the technical test (Date
TBA).
Office Peeps
I understand that the majority will likely
have stopped reading by now but I would
also like to clarify a few points, on
behalf of the GOBO board;
Office Peeps
There has been some unfortunate internal
disagreements here at GOBO but rest
assured, all at GOBO are working extremely
Office Peeps
hard on resolving this peacefully (I hear
cake and interpretative dance may be
involved) and hope to witness the return of
the GOBO Official Photographer, Jessica,
Office Peeps
for Pastry week.
We also hope to announce some exciting
sponsorship news in the coming weeks from
Office Peeps
a company that I understand work within the
space and astronaut industry. They’ve heard
the GOBO challenger cakes are out of this
world...
Office Peeps
Lastly, any comments are that of the GOBO
judging panel (yourselves) and are not
necessarily representative of those on the
Office Peeps
GOBO board. Please contact the GOBO legal
counsel with any issues –
b.henchy@gobo.co.uk
Guy Bake-Off
This is the worst, she must have cheated...
Right \N[0], I don't currently need your
help, it's Tracey and Gill this week, see
if either of them need you...
No
Guy Bake-Off
Alright let me know when you have them.
Guy Bake-Off
Knowing I'm at least getting a meaty pie is
the only thing getting me through this week
...if there aren't any pie's...
Guy Bake-Off
I just don't understand why someone
wouldn't bake a pie!
Guy Bake-Off
Jess asked you to do what? She's doing
what?
Guy Bake-Off
Show me that letter!
Jess's Resignation letter removed from inventory!
Guy Bake-Off
Marty Meringue is representing her!? Right
I'm gonna put an advert up for my own legal
counsel and a new photographer!
Lawyer/Photographer with GOBO.
10 year contract at £1000 per day
We are looking for an experience and enthusiastic
Lawyer to represent our Founder in a number of suits
that have been filed, wrongly.
You will have experience from watching shows like Suits
and Boston Legal.
It would also be desirable if the candidate was a keen
photographer as we are looking to save money by
utilising a candidate with strong skills.
Guy Bake-Off
Wow this advert was written by and applied
for by Billy! He's hired!
Guy Bake-Off
Billy can you look over this response to
the resignation?
Office Peeps
Yeah, let's have a look!
Dear Ms Roberts,
It is unfortunate that you have come to the conclusion
this is your best course of action.
We understand that being involved in the Great Office
Bake Off (GOBO) operations team is high pressure and is
not for everyone.
The position of Baked Goods (BG) Photographer was never
officially assigned to you by an official GOBO board
member, so your resignation from a position you did not
hold perplexes us. Furthermore, if you wished to be
appointed or pursue a role within the Baked Goods
Records team no Mary Berry approved certifications or
training was ever brought to the attention of a GOBO
board member to facilitate an appointment and therefore
allowing us to give you the initiative to record bakes
without interference.  The Baked Goods Records (BGR)
team considered your role that of an intern, enthusiast
or local journalist and does not endorse any material
recorded by you subject to review by an official GOBO
BGR team member.
GOBO makes every effort to make all those involved in
events feel welcome as can be evidenced by anecdotal
evidence such as that attached.
There is no link to the incident of confusion around
your understanding of the work Graphical and GOBO
therefore we will not comment further on these claims.
The second claim you make regarding not being
considered for the alleged GOBO Council has some
inconsistencies. The GOBO Council is currently at
proposal phase and is not in any way at selection
phase. When selection phase started you would have
certainly been a front runner for a role on the GOBO
Council under the circumstances of the day and we do
not understand why you think you would not be included
and feel this may be something you need to reflect on
and provide us clarity. As the selection process will
take into account everyone’s previous contributions to
the proud annual tradition of GOBO we would obviously
consider a role on the GOBO Council for you.
GOBO being made aware of certifications and train you
have would like to consider you for the role of BG
Photographer if it was of interest.
Kind regards,
Guy Bake-Off
Office Peeps
Hmmm... parts of it don't make any sense
but as your legal counsel I recommend that
you send it.
Guy Bake-Off
Right you, send this letter back to them
and this should be the end of it!
GOBO Resignation Response added to inventory!
Guy Bake-Off
Chris sent you to become the official GOBO,
bouncer? Let's have a look at his CV.
Chris's CV removed from inventory
Guy Bake-Off
This looks great! He's ever an Mary Berry
qualified photographer...Chris is hired,
that'll stop them harassing us with their
lawyer!

explore your new surroundings...

Fact of the day
Office Peeps - 2
Did you know Cleopatra was born closer to
the invention of the ipod than the building
of the Pyramids of Giza?
Office Peeps - 2
The Great Fire of London in 1666 only
killed 8 people.
Office Peeps - 2
Juneau is the only state capital in the USA
that is not accessible by road.
Office Peeps - 2
The world’s population is 7.125 billion.
It was half this number just in 1968.
So it’s doubled in 48 years.
That’s terrifying.
Office Peeps - 2
Methuselah, a bristlecone pine tree from
California's White Mountains, is thought to
be almost 5,000 years old—and the oldest
tree in the world. The exact location of
Office Peeps - 2
the gnarled, twisted Methuselah is a Forest
Service secret, for its protection.
Roughly, it is as old as Stone Henge.
Office Peeps - 2
In 1792, French revolutionaries tried to
introduce a ten hour day, with an hour
lasting 100 minutes and a minute lasting
100 seconds. This attempt lasted a few
Office Peeps - 2
years - even clocks were produced that told
the new decimalised time.
YOU CAN SEE ONE IN MALTA IF YOU GO THERE ON
HOLIDAY.
Office Peeps - 2
Unsurprisingly, this fad didn’t last.
Because it’s stupid.
(ten hour clocks that is, not going to
malta on holiday)
Office Peeps - 2
Malta is home to the oldest free standing
structures on earth, around 1000 years
older than the pyramids.
Office Peeps - 2
Did you know Jessica is actually younger
(DOB 1994) than the movie Jurassic Park

In 1992-93, Steven Spielberg was directing
Jurassic Park during the day and then
editing his Oscar winning epic, Schindler’s
List in the evening.
Office Peeps - 2
Steven Spielberg’s wife is the annoying
lady in Indiana Jones and the Temple of

Office Peeps - 2
In the 18th century a travelling theatre
group had developed a special box that
produced a number of different sound
effects.  However, this box was stolen by a
Office Peeps - 2
rival theatre group.  This lead to the
phrase – “To steal ones thunder.”
Office Peeps - 2
The three astronauts who were in Apollo
11’s mission to the moon in 1969 couldn’t
afford the life insurance policy for the
mission.  So instead they each signed
Office Peeps - 2
hundreds of autographs and sent them to a
friend.  If anything was to go wrong these
autographs would be sent on to their
families and they could sell them in order
Office Peeps - 2
to support themselves financially.
Office Peeps - 2
Due to global warming and the melting
Arctic, there is now a surge of ivory
hunters making their way north to discover
mammoth tusks that are appearing out of the
Office Peeps - 2
melting permafrost.  Mammoth ivory, unlike
elephant ivory, is legal.
Bonus fact:  You can tell the age of a
Office Peeps - 2
woolly mammoth by counting the rings in its
tusk, just like a tree.
Office Peeps - 2
You can’t digest edible glitter.  Your poop
just looks like tinsel.
Office Peeps - 2
In the early 1970s, Major League Baseball
players seldom wore facial hair. As
detailed in the book Mustache Gang, Oakland
Athletics owner Charlie Finley decided to
Office Peeps - 2
hold a moustache-growing contest within his
team. When the A's faced the Cincinnati
Reds, whose team rules forbade facial hair,
in the 1972 World Series, the series was
Office Peeps - 2
dubbed by media as "the hairs vs. the
squares"
Office Peeps - 2
Wheat, rice, and corn all have more complex
genomes than humans.
Office Peeps - 2
Aberdeen FC are the only club in Scotland
to have never been relegated.  They have
also been at the top of the league every
season.  (This is because they start with
Office Peeps - 2
Office Peeps - 2
The UK now consumes more avacados than
oranges.
Office Peeps - 2
The Queen Mother used to sign off her
letters with:  ‘Tinky Tonk old fruit and
down with the nazis!’
Office Peeps - 2
Peanuts are not nuts. They are legumes.
Office Peeps - 2
Office Peeps - 2
The deep fried mars bar was invented in my
glorious  hometown of Stonehaven. There is
a banner over the chippie to commemorate
this. The council tried to get it removed
Office Peeps - 2
as it promoted an unhealthy diet. They were
forced to withdraw after public outcry.
Office Peeps - 2
Norwegian scientists have hypothesized that
Rudolph’s red nose is probably the result
of a parasitic infection of his respiratory
system.
Office Peeps - 2
Contrary to popular belief, suicide rates
during the Christmas holiday are low. The
highest rates are during the spring.
Office Peeps - 2
Most of Santa’s reindeer have male-sounding
names, such as Blitzen, Comet, and Cupid.
However, male reindeers shed their antlers
around Christmas, so either they wrongly
Office Peeps - 2
named female reindeer or castrated.
Office Peeps - 2
Rose water is often used in the Middle East
to mask unpleasant odours and flavours
found in tap water.  Could someone do this
to mask certain flavours in their cake?
Office Peeps - 2
Bonus Fact:
Eve’s Pudding is one of Mary Berry’s all
time favourite desserts.  She loves its
Office Peeps - 2
simplicity, flavours and complete lack of
rosewater.
Office Peeps
For one time only Billy here to give you a
fact!
Cork Harbour is a natural harbour and river
Office Peeps
estuary at the mouth of the River Lee in
County Cork, Ireland. It is one of the
largest natural harbour in the world by
navigational area. Other contenders include
Office Peeps
Port Jackson, Sydney, Halifax Harbour in
Canada, and Poole Harbour in the United
Kingdom.
Office Peeps - 2
Loch Ness has more water in it than all the
lakes and lochs of the UK combined.
Office Peeps - 2
Lough Neagh in Northern Ireland??
Office Peeps - 2
Total volume of the largest 8 lakes by
volume in the UK that are not Loch Ness =
13.59, so even subtracting the volume of
Loch Neagh the total volume of the rest of
Office Peeps - 2
the lakes exceeds 10 cubic Kilometers.
Office Peeps - 2
Andrew is officially off the Fact of the
Day mailing list...
Office Peeps - 2
The Canary Islands are not named after the
bird but a large multitude of dogs the
Romans came across when they arrived 2000
years ago.
Office Peeps - 2
The founder of The Smurfs - Belgian
cartoonist Peyo said this of Smurfette when
asked about her character traits: “She is
incapable of telling a joke without blowing
Office Peeps - 2
the punch line. She is a blabbermouth but
only makes superficial comments. She is
constantly creating enormous problems for
the Smurfs but always manages to blame it
Office Peeps - 2
on someone else.”
Office Peeps - 2
Jess claims that a crow spoke to her this
morning.
But did you know that crows are pretty
Office Peeps - 2
weird after all, for instance:
Crows will crush an ant and rub it all over
themselves like perfume. The Formic Acid in
Office Peeps - 2
the ants helps ward off parasites.
Office Peeps - 2
Botanically speaking, a coconut is a
fibrous one-seeded drupe, also known as a
dry drupe. However, when using loose
definitions, the coconut can be all three:
Office Peeps - 2
a fruit, a nut, and a seed.
Office Peeps - 2
Craig David’s favourite film is Charlie and
the Chocolate Factory.
For more information about Craig David,
Office Peeps - 2
please feel free to ask Jess.
Office Peeps - 2
Horses make many noises but they do not
bray.
Apart from in the new Zelda, where you can
Office Peeps - 2
talk with them in the ancient horse tongue
of ‘Bray.’
Office Peeps - 2
The only animal other than humans that can
catch leprosy is the armadillo.

office

The word ‘decimate’ is often wrongly used.
It literally means to reduce something by
Office Peeps - 2
So if you hear that Scotland were decimated
by England on Saturday this is wrong. I
wish we were decimated by England. We were
beaten by 290%. We were destroyed. We lost
Office Peeps - 2
so many players to injury they will have to
hold ballots in Murrayfield to fill the
subs bench this Saturday.

As your legal counsel it's the yeast I
could do!
Let's see...
To Mr Guy Bakeoff,
Please find the following details of my resignation
from my current post of Office Bakeoff 2016 Lead
Photographer.
I have come to this decision after much thought and
consideration, although I enjoy being part of the
Office Bakeoff I feel as though my talent and skills
are consistently under appreciated and I am not taken
seriously as a trained photographer.
A few incidents have lead me to this conclusion. I am
sure you will remember a time when you explained to me
in detail the meaning of the word "graphic", which is
quite insulting to someone who studied Graphic Design.
This combined with your initial hesitation of my taking
on this role didn't exactly fill me with confidence
that I was welcome as part of the Office Bakeoff team.
When I recently discovered that I was not being
considered for a coveted position on the esteemed
Office Bakeoff Council, despite my hard work and
efforts on The Office Bakeoff 2015, this cemented my
decision.
I would like to take this opportunity to thank you for
the experiences I have had in my short time as Office
Bakeoff 2016 Lead Photographer and to express my
sadness at having to leave.
Best of luck in the future.
Kind regards,
Jessica.
